
Escape the Dark

# BITSY VERSION 4.8

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

PAL 0
NAME dark
0,0,0
28,59,64
117,117,117

50,78,145

ITM 0
00000000

01100100
00100100
00011000
00000000
NAME tea
DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
I only come out at night. The bright lights hurt my eyes.

DLG SPR_1
It's such a nice day! It's a shame I have no idea how to get out of this place.

END 0


END undefined
The End!

VAR a
42
